Description:

The official game of motocross with you again! Challenge yourself by participating in two championships MXGP with all riders and motorcycles in categories MX1 and MX2! Take the challenge of promising young riders in the MX2 and MX1 Champion and join them on the slopes ! Chase through official routes championship for the first time reproduced in detail in games motocross . Try to official team noticed you during Debut Season and sent invitations to help you start your career in the MX2. Continue to participate in the competition , as long as your results will not be allowed to receive an invitation in the MX1, where you can fight with the real heroes motokrossa.Polnostyu take control motorcycle using two mini- joystick : advanced physics of the game allows you to control the bike and rider separately. Jump, scrub and whip! All at your fingertips!
